statements: SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_age >= 20
SELECT student_id, student_email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31' ORDER BY student_age
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE enrollment_status = true ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE student_age < 25 AND enrollment_status = false
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%' AND enrollment_status = true
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor FROM Courses;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM Enrollments WHERE enroll_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, course_name, enroll_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT student_name, course_name, enroll_date FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT student_name, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses_enrolled FROM Students s JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id GROUP BY student_name;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enroll_date FROM Students s LEFT JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id LEFT JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY enroll_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, full_name, email FROM students WHERE birthdate < '1990-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM students WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, birthdate FROM students WHERE birthdate < '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(enrollment_id) AS enrollment_count FROM enrollments GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(enrollment_id) > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT full_name, email FROM students WHERE address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE dob < '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date FROM Courses WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_id, enrolled_date FROM Students ORDER BY enrolled_date DESC;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name FROM Teachers;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE dob > '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date, grade FROM Enrollments WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name FROM Teachers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
